page.title: 02BAYSTON HILL BONFIRE NIGHT
page.content: This is organised by the fund raising committee of the local scouts and guides.It is held on the field behind the scout hut in Eric Lock Road West on the nearest Saturday to November 5th.A notice in the Villager 6 weeks before the event asks for burnable rubbish.This is collected by committee members and Scouts and Guides using a local farmers tractor and trailer. Another committee member buys the fireworks from funds donated and there is a collection at the display there are some side shows :pomagne wheel,coconut shy and candy floss.The cubs and brownies run a tea and soup stall.And the scouts and guides a hot dog stall.Tickets for the hot dogs can be bought at local shops before the event.Profits go towards the buying of equipment and the running of the scout hut.
